Field.Name: ShiftTypeCode
Field.DataQuerySql: select shifttypecode from tblshift where shiftcode='{0}'

Field.Name: SegmentCode
Field.DataQuerySql: select segcode from tblss where sscode='{0}'

Field.Name: ShiftTypeCode
Field.DataQuerySql: select shifttypecode from tblss where sscode='{0}'

Field.Name: OPControl
Field.DataQuerySql: select opcontrol from tblop where opcode='{0}'

Field.Name: OPID
Field.DataQuerySql: select opid from tblItemRoute2OP where itemcode='{0}' and routecode='{1}' and opcode='{2}'
